/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A red car is parked on the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, mountains can be seen, adding depth and a sense of grandeur to the landscape. The image is a beautiful representation of the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
